snippet.title: The Forest Cathedral - trailer
snippet.description:
https://whitethorndigital.com/the-forest-cathedral

The Forest Cathedral is a first-person psychological thriller set on a remote island. Playing as scientist Rachel Carson, players will figure out why the island won’t let her leave.

The game tells the real-life story of the attempted silence of Rachel Carson and her discoveries on the harmful pesticide known as DDT.

In The Forest Cathedral, players will experience:
-Dramatic retelling of the story of Rachel Carson
-Unique blending of 2D and 3D worlds that will surprise and delight
-Meticulously crafted forested island to explore
-Fully voiced dialogue and narrative
-Enchanting original soundtrack

Song: With That I Was Sold by Marigold ft. Zoe Scruggs
